scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run tscheck && npm run test:cov
scripts.test:w: mocha -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register/transpile-only --reporter min -t 15s --watch-extensions ts --watch src/**/*.spec.ts --node_env=test
scripts.test:d: node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register/transpile-only node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --no-timeouts --watch-extensions ts --watch src/**/*.spec.ts --node_env=test
